actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits due a deceased SSI recipient may be paid to his or her ineligible spouse, or (if the recipient was a disabled child) to his or her parent, where such spouse or parent was living with the recipient at the time of his or her death.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits due a deceased SSI recipient shall be paid to the recipient's: (1) ineligible spouse if they were living together; or (2) parent living in the same household as the recipient where the recipient was a disabled child under age 18.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits due a deceased SSI recipient may be paid to his or her ineligible spouse, or (if the recipient was a disabled child) to his or her parent, where such spouse or parent was living with the recipient at the time of his or her death.
